Búsqueda rápida

core¶

This app is to manage the models and migrations.

models¶

class applications.core.models.UserManager(*args, **kwargs)¶

Class to create a base user to inherit for

use_in_migrations = True¶
create_user(email, password=None, **extra_fields)¶

Function to create and save a user with the given account_no and password.

Parámetros

  • email (str) – Email to save on the DB.

  • password (str) – Password to save on the DB.

  • extra_fields – Extra fields to save on the DB.

Devuelve

The user created

Tipo del valor devuelto

UserManager:

create_superuser(email, password, **extra_fields)¶

Function to create and save a superuser with the given account_no and password and the privileges added.

Parámetros

  • email (str) – Email to save on the DB.

  • password (str) – Password to save on the DB.

  • extra_fields – Extra fields to save on the DB.

Devuelve

The superuser created

Tipo del valor devuelto
